course_description: Learners are introduced to the major components of the evidence based practice process. The steps in implementing evidence based practice are explored in depth. Issues related to information management technology will be introduced.
prerequisites: NRSG 709D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1730, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: B. Swan, Status: Open
